sentences.en: Aids has cut a swathe through battalions of ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病已经夺去了无数平民百姓的生命。

sentences.en: FLOODWATERS have lain waste to an almost unbelievably large swathe of Pakistan.
sentences.cn: 洪水使巴基斯坦境内大片区域成为废墟,受灾面积之广,令人触目惊心.

sentences.en: His mother in the house looked out of and swathe two get closer and closer.
sentences.cn: 他的妈妈从家里往外看,正巧看到小男孩和鳄鱼越来越接近.

sentences.en: Keegan's team have been cutting an irresistible swathe through the first division.
sentences.cn: 基冈的球队在甲级赛中所向披靡。

sentences.en: On May 1st the army took over another swathe of territory.
sentences.cn: 军队在5月1号又接管了另一长条领土。

sentences.en: Outside the city a swathe of farmland the size of Portugal has been destroyed.
sentences.cn: 郊外的大片农田带被摧毁,面积足有葡萄牙国土那么大.

sentences.en: The combine had cut a swathe around the edge of the field.
sentences.cn: 联合收割机把庄稼绕田边割了一长条。

sentences.en: The farmer cut a swathe in the field with his scythe.
sentences.cn: 农夫用镰刀在地里刈出一条路来.

sentences.en: The moon was swathed in mist.
The storm cut a swathe through southern England.
sentences.cn: 风暴重创了英格兰南部。

sentences.en: The storm cut a swathe through the forest.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨把大片大片的森林夷为平地.

sentences.en: Torrential rain and a howling tempest cut a swathe of destruction across the country.
sentences.cn: 狂风暴雨横扫全国，所到之处，一片狼藉。

sentences.en: We fired together and cut a swathe in the lines of enemey soldiers.
sentences.cn: 我们同时开火,如割草船将敌兵撂倒了一大片.

phrases.tran_cn: 横扫而过（造成破坏，改变）；夷为平地

trans.tran_cn: 带子，绷带，包装品，“swath”的变体，包扎绷带，包布

trans.tran_en: to wrap or cover something in something
